fr.inria.atlanmod.mogwai.common.logging

Class MogwaiLogger

  • Object
    • MogwaiLogger

  • public final class MogwaiLogger
extends Object
    The factory that creates instances of Loggers.

    It also provides static methods for logging without declaring a specific instance. In this case, the root logger is used by default.

    • Method Summary
